players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "I am the detective and I found Alice is the mafioso"
You: "Bob is lying, I am the detective."
Bob: "I am the detective and I found Alice to be the mafioso. She is now lying, which means she was likely the one who killed Diana last night."
